Bash(python3 -c "
import asyncio
import openai

client = openai.AsyncOpenAI\(
    api_key=''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'',
    base_url=''https://openrouter.ai/api/v1'',
\)

async def test\(\):
    print\(''Testing Kimi K2 Thinking model...''\)
    stream = await client.chat.completions.create\(
        model=''moonshotai/kimi-k2-thinking'',
        messages=[{''role'': ''user'', ''content'': ''What is 15 * 37?''}],
        max_tokens=500,
        stream=True,
    \)
    
    print\(''Checking chunk structure...''\)
    async for chunk in stream:
        if chunk.choices:
            delta = chunk.choices[0].delta
            # Print all attributes to see what''s available
            print\(f''Delta attrs: {[a for a in dir\(delta\) if not a.startswith\(""_""\)]}''\)
            if hasattr\(delta, ''reasoning_content''\) and delta.reasoning_content:
                print\(f''REASONING: {delta.reasoning_content}''\)
            if delta.content:
                print\(f''CONTENT: {delta.content}''\)
            break  # Just check first chunk structure

asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
")
